item.title: The Self
item.description: One day you’re going about your mundane life then seemingly out of nowhere, you stumble upon a concept and life is never the same again. I don’t remember where I read it from but I haven’t been able to unsee it since. It comes to my mind everytime I suprise people by what I say. This is the idea of the two personas we all carry: the essential self and the social self.
